name: Rolling Rooms
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam 153 "Roll"

Roll your way to victory through 10 levels but be careful of hazards like anti-gravity and spikes. Oh and did we mention you cant move the player? Yep you heard us right, you have to get through this challenge by rotating the level itself. 

Controls:

Rotate the level:            A/S or Arrow keys

Restart the level:                              R

Credits:
